reviews.title: Poor customer service
reviews.text: Staff was rude and unhelpful. Waited an hour just to be dismissed.

reviews.text: Constantly losing signal and calls drop frequently. Very frustrating.

reviews.text: Dead zones everywhere. Can't even load basic websites.
